pages.text: As the storage manager, the maid will check all the chests under her control from time to time, but when you've put in/taken out some new items into a chest, the maid won't always notice immediately. $(br) Use the change flag and sneak right-click on the chests that need to be checked, then right-click on the maid, and the maid will check those chests once more as a priority.
